Test Name: TRIPARTITE MOTIF-CONTAINING PROTEIN 46 (TRIM46) IgG Tissue Immunofluorescence Titer
Purpose: To detect and determine the end-point titer of TRIM46 IgG antibodies in spinal fluid using a tissue immunofluorescence method for accurate clinical assessment.
Container: Sterile, sealed spinal fluid collection container
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope with FITC filter, incubation chamber (37 Â°C), centrifuge, vortex mixer, timer
